DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect Apixaban Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) multiple-dose Digoxin healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Drug Interaction Study Effect Apixaban PK Digoxin Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: • Healthy subject determine clinically significant deviation normal medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECGs ) , clinical laboratory determination • Any significant acute chronic medical illness , history important arrhythmia , history evidence abnormal bleed coagulation disorder , significant head injury within last 2 year
